description.value:
You have formed a bond with a wildfire spirit, a primal being of creation and destruction. Your link with this spirit grants you access to to certain spells. At 2nd level, you learn the fire bolt cantrip.

At 3rd, 5th, 7th, and 9th level you gain access to the spells listed for that level in the Circle of Wildfire Spells table. Once you gain access to one of these spells, you always have it prepared, and it does not count against the number of spells you can prepare each day. If you gain access to a spell that does not appear on the druid spell list, the spell is nonetheless a druid spell for you.
